books.title: Phantastes
books.author: George MacDonald
books.summary: A young man awakes in Fairy Land, where he takes part in a series of strange adventures.

books.title: The Blue Lagoon
books.author: H. de Vere Stacpoole
books.summary: After a shipwreck, two surviving children are stranded on an island paradise, experiencing its bounties and resources, facing the dangers of the natural world, and undergoing their own maturation and romance.

books.title: A Daughter of the Samurai
books.author: Etsu Inagaki Sugimoto
books.summary: The autobiography of Etsu Sugimoto, a girl born into a samurai family in a time of great cultural changes.

books.title: Queen Victoria
books.author: Lytton Strachey
books.summary: A sardonic and generally unflattering biography of Victoria Alexandrina, Queen of England.

books.title: A Little Princess
books.author: Frances Hodgson Burnett
books.summary: A young girl discovers a life of unexpected challenges when she goes to live at a London boarding school.

books.title: The Way of the World
books.author: William Congreve
books.summary: Two lovers are prevented from marrying due to a previous dalliance.

books.title: Uncle Vanya
books.author: Anton Chekhov
books.summary: An elderly professor and his young wife return to their country estate, where their family’s simmering resentments boil over.

books.title: Zuni Folktales
books.author: Frank Hamilton Cushing
books.summary: A collection of folktales from the Zuni culture.

books.title: Pelle the Conqueror
books.author: Martin Andersen Nexø
books.summary: As a poor boy grows up to be a man, he becomes determined to solve the plight of his fellow men.

books.title: At the Mountains of Madness
books.author: H. P. Lovecraft
books.summary: An Antarctic expedition reveals the horrifying reality of ancient myths in the depths of the continent.

books.title: Up from Slavery
books.author: Booker T. Washington
books.summary: The autobiography of Booker T. Washington, former slave and founder of the Tuskegee Institute.

books.title: The Valley of Fear
books.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
books.summary: The final novel in Sir Arthur Conan Doyle’s Sherlock Holmes series follows the eponymous hero as he investigates a Sussex murder seemingly connected with a secret society.

books.title: The Diary
books.author: Samuel Pepys
books.summary: The diary of a man living in London in the 17th century.

books.title: Short Works
books.author: Epictetus
books.summary: A collection of Epictetus’s short works.

books.title: Poetry
books.author: Fernando Pessoa
books.summary: A collection of Fernando Pessoa’s poetry.

books.title: Democracy
books.author: Henry Adams
books.summary: A wealthy New York widow moves to Washington, DC, hoping to get “to the heart of the great American mystery of democracy and government.”

books.title: Triplanetary
books.author: E. E. Smith
books.summary: In a universe where all powerful alien races influence the fates of worlds, a war erupts between the Triplanetary League of the inner solar system, pirates led by a mysterious and malicious scientist, and technologically advanced aliens.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Anthony Trollope
books.summary: A collection of Anthony Trollope’s short stories, ordered by date of first publication.

books.title: The Everlasting Man
books.author: G. K. Chesterton
books.summary: G. K. Chesterton takes us through the history of man, rebuking common secular views and presenting the case for the Catholic Church.

books.title: Through the Brazilian Wilderness
books.author: Theodore Roosevelt
books.summary: Theodore Roosevelt’s autobiographical account of his expedition into the uncharted depths of the Brazilian rainforest.
